item.title: Linux命令 wget
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: wget http://tel.mirrors.163.com/centos/6.4/isos/x86_64/CentOS-6.4-x86_64-bin-DVD1.iso # 下载centos境像 wget -c http://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm/download/download-thanks.html?platform=linux # 断点续传下载文件 wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.31.0/install.sh | bash wget -P /home/download http://tel.mirrors.163.com/centos/6.4/isos/x86_64/CentOS-6.4-x86_64-bin-DVD1.iso #指定目录下载 wget -Q 1M http://tel.mirrors.163.com/centos/6.4/isos/x86_64/CentOS-6.4-x86_64-bin-DVD1.iso #限定最大下载速度 wget -r -np -nd http://tel.mirrors.163.com/centos/6.4/os/x86_64/ #下载 http://tel.mirrors.163.com/centos/6.4/os/x86_64/ 目录中的所有文
